name: Cepheus Heights
description:
Welcome to Cepheus!

Cepheus Heights is a short platformer where you need to jump, slice, climb, and swing  to traverse a dangerous planet.

Andromeda is given a job. Find Percy. His last signal was found here on Cepheus. Simple enough, right?

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move and J/Z to jump. The rest is explained in game.

--Credits--

Game by: Dameron Cook

Dialogue system by Friendly Cosmonaut

Font used: Gravity Bold 8 by John Watson

Music inspired/learned by feezo.

Emotional support by my dogs Kirby and Gizmo

--Software--

Gamemaker Studio 2

LMMS

Bosca ceoil

Audacity

Aseprite

Help me improve by leaving a comment of your thoughts down below! All criticism is very much appreciated.
